greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 0; for n > 1, if n is not squarefree, then a(n) = A057627(n), otherwise a(n) = A013928(n).
comment: Each number n > 0 occurs exactly twice in this sequence, at the positions A005117(1+n) and A013929(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(1) = 0; for n > 1, if A008683(n) is 0 [when n is not squarefree], then a(n) = A057627(n), otherwise a(n) = A013928(n).
program: def a057627(n): return n - sum([mobius(k)**2 for k in range(1, n + 1)])
def a013928(n): return sum([1 for i in range(1, n) if core(i) == i])
print([a(n) for n in range(1, 121)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Apr 17 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 17 2017
